meanings.sent1: The unicorn in the story was imaginarily colorful.
meanings.sent2: Children often have imaginarily friends they play with.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch an imaginarily mouse on the TV screen.
meanings.sent4: Her imaginarily world was filled with dragons and fairies.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted an imaginarily landscape with floating islands.

meanings.definition: In an imaginary manner or way
meanings.sent1: She danced imaginarily around the room, lost in her thoughts.
meanings.sent2: The children played imaginarily, pretending to be superheroes.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked imaginarily at the mailman, thinking he was a threat.
meanings.sent4: The music transported her imaginarily to a magical forest.
meanings.sent5: He ran imaginarily fast, trying to catch the train before it left.
